articles.author: Simon Elegant
articles.title: China’s trade surplus with the world tops $1 trillion, despite tariffs - The Washington Post
articles.description: Chinese exports to the United States continued to crater last month, but the drop was made up by booming sales in Southeast Asia and Europe.
articles.content: Chinas trade surplus with the rest of the world has topped $1 trillion for the first time, news that calls into question the effectiveness of developed countries and especially President Donald Trump… [+71 chars]

articles.title: New mpox strain identified in England - BBC
articles.description: It's a mix of two major types of the virus, and has been found in someone who recently returned from Asia.
articles.content:
A new strain of mpox, previously called monkeypox, has been detected in a person in England, say UK health officials.
The virus is a mix of two major types of the mpox virus, and was found in someon… [+3147 chars]
